00024     /**
00025      * @brief Formats URL.
00026      * 
00027      * @param string $url The URL.
00028      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00029      * @return string Returns formated URL on success, FALSE on failure.
00030      * 
00031      * @todo Finish function.
00032      */
00033     public static function formatUrl($url, $format = 0) {
00034         if (BOO_DEBUG) { trigger_error('Warning Boo_Format::formatUrl() is not finished', E_USER_WARNING); }
00035         $url = trim($url);
00036         if (!$url) {
00037             return false;
00038         }
00039         return Boo_Helper::addHttp($url);
00040     }
00041     
00042     /**
00043      * @brief Formats URI.
00044      * 
00045      * @param string $url The URI.
00046      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00047      * @return string Returns formated URI on success, FALSE on failure.
00048      * 
00049      * @todo Finish function.
00050      */
00051     public static function formatUri($uri, $format = 0) {
00052         if (BOO_DEBUG) { trigger_error('Warning Boo_Format::formatUri() is not finished', E_USER_WARNING); }
00053         $uri = trim($uri);
00054         if (!$uri) {
00055             return false;
00056         }
00057         return Boo_Helper::addHttp($url);
00058     }
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * @brief Formats phone number.
00062      * 
00063      * @param string $phoneNumber The phone number.
00064      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00065      * 
00066      * Possible formats are:
00067      * \li 0 = 8003682669
00068      * \li 1 = 800-368-2669
00069      * \li 2 = (800) 368-2669
00070      * \li 3 = 800.368.2669
00071      * 
00072      * @return string Formated phone number, FALSE on failure.
00073      */
00074     public static function formatPhoneNumber($phoneNumber, $format = 0) {
00075         $phoneNumber = trim($phoneNumber);
00076         $result = false;
00077         
00078         $phoneNumber = Boo_Helper::removeNonNumeric($phoneNumber);
00079         
00080         // test phone number
00081         if (!Boo_Validator::isPhoneNumber($phoneNumber)) {
00082             trigger_error("Phone number {$phoneNumber} is not valid", E_USER_NOTICE);
00083             return false;
00084         }
00085         
00086         // clean up phone number
00087         if (strlen($phoneNumber) == 11 && substr($phoneNumber, 0, 1) == 1) {
00088             // remove leading 1 from phone number
00089             $phoneNumber = substr($phoneNumber, 1);
00090         }
00091         
00092         switch ($format) {
00093             case 0: // 5555555555
00094                 $result = $phoneNumber;
00095                 break;
00096             case 1: // 555-555-5555
00097                 $result = substr($phoneNumber, 0, 3). '-' . substr($phoneNumber, 3, 3) . '-' . substr($phoneNumber, 6, 4);
00098                 break;
00099             case 2: // (555) 555-5555
00100                 $result = '('. substr($phoneNumber, 0, 3). ') ' . substr($phoneNumber, 3, 3) . '-' . substr($phoneNumber, 6, 4);
00101                 break;
00102             case 3: // 555.555.5555
00103                 $result = substr($phoneNumber, 0, 3). '.' . substr($phoneNumber, 3, 3) . '.' . substr($phoneNumber, 6, 4);
00104                 break;
00105             default:
00106                 trigger_error("Format {$format} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00107                 return false;
00108         }
00109         
00110         return $result;
00111     }
00112

00114     /**
00115      * @brief Formats phone extension.
00116      * 
00117      * @param string $phoneExt The phone extension.
00118      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00119      * 
00120      * Possible formats are:
00121      * \li 0 = 1234
00122      * \li 1 = x1234
00123      * 
00124      * @return string Formated phone extension, FALSE on failure.
00125      */
00126     public static function formatPhoneExtension($phoneExt, $format = 0) {
00127         $phoneExt = trim($phoneExt);
00128         $result = false;
00129         
00130         $phoneExt = Boo_Helper::removeNonNumeric($phoneExt);
00131         
00132         // test phone number
00133         if (!Boo_Validator::isPhoneExtenstion($phoneExt)) {
00134             trigger_error("Phone extension {$phoneExt} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00135             return false;
00136         }
00137         
00138         switch ($format) {
00139             case 0: // 1234
00140                 $result = $phoneExt;
00141                 break;
00142             case 1: // x1234
00143                 $result = 'x' . $phoneExt;
00144                 break;
00145             default:
00146                 trigger_error("Format {$format} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00147                 return false;
00148         }
00149         
00150         return $result;
00151     }

00153     /**
00154      * @brief Formats ZIP code.
00155      * 
00156      * @param string $zip The ZIP code.
00157      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00158      * 
00159      * Possible formats are:
00160      * \li 0 = 123451234
00161      * \li 1 = 12345-1234
00162      * 
00163      * @return string Formated ZIP code, FALSE on failure.
00164      * @todo International support.
00165      */
00166     public static function formatZip($zip, $format = 0) {
00167         $zip = trim($zip);
00168         $result = false;
00169         
00170         if ($zip == null) {
00171             return false; 
00172         }
00173         
00174         $zip = Boo_Helper::removeNonNumeric($zip);
00175         
00176         if (!Boo_Validator::isZip($zip)) {
00177             trigger_error("Zip code {$zip} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00178             return false;
00179         }
00180         
00181         switch ($format) {
00182             case 0:
00183                 $result = $zip;
00184                 break;
00185             case 1: // 12345-1234
00186                 $length = strlen($zip);
00187                 if ($length == 5) { // 5 digit code
00188                     $result = $zip;
00189                 } elseif ($length == 9) { // 9 digit code
00190                     $result = substr($phoneNumber, 0, 5). '-' . substr($phoneNumber, 5, 4);
00191                 } else {
00192                     trigger_error("Zip code {$zip} with length {$length} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00193                     return false;
00194                 }
00195                 break;
00196             default:
00197                 trigger_error("Format {$format} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00198                 return false;
00199         }
00200         
00201         return $result;
00202     }

00204     /**
00205      * @brief Formats a card number.
00206      * 
00207      * Possible formats are:
00208      * \li 0 = 5424000000000015
00209      * 
00210      * @param string $cardNumber The card number.
00211      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00212      * 
00213      * @return string Formated card number on success, FALSE on failure.
00214      * 
00215      * @todo Add more formats.
00216      */
00217     public static function formatCardNumber($cardNumber, $format = 0) {
00218         $cardNumber = trim($cardNumber);
00219         
00220         if (Boo_Validator::isCardNumber($cardNumber)) {
00221             return Boo_Helper::removeNonNumeric($cardNumber);
00222         } else {
00223             trigger_error('Card number (hidden) is not valid', E_USER_WARNING);
00224             return false;
00225         }
00226         
00227     }
00228     
00229     /**
00230      * @brief Formats expiration date.
00231      * 
00232      * Expiration date can be in the following formats:
00233      * \li MMYY
00234      * \li MM/YY
00235      * \li MM-YY
00236      * \li MMYYYY
00237      * \li MM/YYYY
00238      * \li MM-YYYY
00239      * \li YYYY-MM-DD
00240      * \li YYYY/MM/DD
00241      * 
00242      * Possible formats are:
00243      * \li 0 = MMDD
00244      * 
00245      * @param string $expDate The expiration date.
00246      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00247      * @todo Add support for other formats.
00248      * @return string Formated expiration date on success, FALSE on failure.
00249      */
00250     public static function formatExpDate($expDate, $format = 0) {
00251         $expDate = trim($expDate);
00252         if (Boo_Validator::isNull($expDate)) {
00253             return false;
00254         }
00255         
00256         
00257         $expDate = Boo_Helper::removeNonNumeric($expDate);
00258         $length = strlen($expDate);
00259         
00260         $year = ''; $month = '';
00261         // parse out year, month, and day
00262         switch ($length) {
00263             
00264             case 4: // MMYY
00265                 $month = substr($expDate, 0, 2);
00266                 $year = substr($expDate, 2, 2);
00267                 break;
00268                 
00269             case 6: // MMYYYY
00270                 $month = substr($expDate, 0, 2);
00271                 $year = substr($expDate, 4, 2);
00272                 break;
00273                 
00274             case 8: // YYYYMMDD
00275                 $month = substr($expDate, 4, 2);
00276                 $year = substr($expDate, 2, 2);
00277                 break;
00278                 
00279             default:
00280                 trigger_error("Expiration date {$expDate} is not valid.", E_USER_WARNING);
00281                 return false;
00282         }
00283         
00284         return $month . $year;
00285         
00286     }

00288     /**
00289      * @brief Formats email address.
00290      * 
00291      * @param string $email The email address.
00292      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00293      * @return bool Returns formated email address on success, FALSE on failure.
00294      * @todo Add additional formats.
00295      */
00296     public static function formatEmail($email, $format = 0) {
00297         $email = strtolower(trim($email));
00298         
00299         if (Boo_Validator::isEmail($email)) {
00300             return $email;
00301         } else {
00302             trigger_error("Email address {$email} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00303             return false;
00304         }
00305     }

00307     /**
00308      * @brief Formats a Socical Security number.
00309      * 
00310      * @param string $ssNumber The Social Security number.
00311      * @param int $format[optional] The format.
00312      * @return bool Returns formated Social Security number on success, FALSE on failure.
00313      * @todo Add additional formats.
00314      */
00315     public static function formatSocialSecurityNumber($ssNumber, $format = 0) {
00316         $ssNumber = trim($ssNumber);
00317         $ssNumber = ereg_replace('[^0-9]+', '', $ssNumber);
00318         
00319         if (Boo_Validator::isSocialSecurityNumber($ssNumber)) {
00320             return substr($ssNumber, 0, 3) . '-' . substr($ssNumber, 3, 2) . '-' . substr($ssNumber, 5, 4);
00321             
00322         } else {
00323             trigger_error("Social Security number {$ssNumber} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00324             return false;
00325         }
00326         
00327     }
00328     
00329     /**
00330      * @brief Formats prices.
00331      * 
00332      * @param string $price The price.
00333      * @param string $format[optional] The format.
00334      * @return bool Returns formated price on success, FALSE on failure.
00335      * @todo Add additional formats.
00336      */
00337     public static function formatPrice($price, $format = 0) {
00338         $price = Boo_Helper::removeCurrencySymbol($price);
00339         $format = strtolower(trim($format));
00340         
00341         if (Boo_Validator::isNull($price)) {
00342             return '0.00';
00343         }
00344         
00345         if (Boo_Validator::isPrice($price)) {
00346             
00347             switch ($format) {
00348                 case '0':
00349                     return number_format($price, 2);
00350                     break;
00351                 case '1': case 'db':
00352                     return number_format($price, 2, '.', '');
00353                     break;
00354                     
00355                 default:
00356                     trigger_error("Fromat {$format} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00357                     return false;
00358                 }
00359         } else {
00360             trigger_error("Price {$price} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00361             return false;
00362         }
00363         
00364     }
00365     
00366     /**
00367      * @brief Formats a value.
00368      * 
00369      * Use # in the format rule to represent the value.
00370      * 
00371      * @param string $value The value to format.
00372      * @param string $formatRule The format rule.
00373      * @return mixed The value if format was successful, FALSE otherwise.
00374      */
00375     public static function format($value, $formatRule) {
00376         $value = trim($value);
00377         $value = quote($value);
00378         
00379         // make dollar sign safe
00380         $value = str_replace('$', '\$', $value);
00381         
00382         $formatRule = trim($formatRule);
00383         // add ending semicolon if needed
00384         if (substr($formatRule, -1) != ';') {
00385             $formatRule .= ';';
00386         }
00387         $formatRule = str_replace('#', $value, $formatRule);
00388         
00389         $result = eval("return {$formatRule}");
00390         return $result;
00391     }
00392 }
